issue.title: PrettyPrint Improvements
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18359](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18359). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have some pretty printing capabilities, but we may want to think at a high level about the design first.
